item.description:
FULL-TILT VARIEY SHOW at AS220!
Hosted by local musician/storyteller Keith Munslow
EMPIRE REVUE brings you sketch comedy, improv, musical interludes, burlesque, special guests and general devilment, on the first Sunday of every month!

8:00 pm â€¢ $8 (still cheaper than a movie!)
AS220 - 115 Empire St., Providence RI
Featuring:
sizzling music by: Superchief Trio
and comedy and mayhem by: The Sparkling Beatniks
Marya Errin Jones, Richard Goulis, Eric Fulford
Hannah Devine, & Kate Lohman
Presenting a raft of talented local performers the likes of which you have never seen!
THIS MONTH'S SPECIAL GUESTS: TBA
Empire Revue is sponsored by:
EMPIRE LOAN
North Main Street, Providence RI
Visit us at:
empirerevue.com & blogspot

If anyone wants to do dinner, we can eat at the Tacqueria next door, meet at 7pm for that option!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the tall guy who looks like my profile photo 8)
item.name: Empire Revue Comedy at AS220
